title: Brie Lives Her Fairy Tale
description: Submissive in Love #8 (Finale!)Prepare to be romanced…Brie Bennett’s Master is about to make all of her dreams come true. The wedding is almost here but darkness lies ahead—a plot so horrendous it will rock their foundation to the core—yet love as fierce as theirs cannot be denied. Join our favorite submissive as she discovers the romance that awaits when an Italian Dom plans the wedding of the century for his bride.Get carried away with Brie in this final novella of the Submissive in Love series.Erotic Romance (18+)
author: Red Phoenix
